title: Inform Interpol to arrest Avant Garde Chairman immediately: Vijitha Herath
body_lines: Parliamentarian Vijitha Herath today requested the government to take immediate action by informing the Interpol to arrest the Avant Garde Chairman, Nissanka Senadhipathi, who left the country for Dubai this morning.
He said the Avant Garde Chairman had robbed billions of Sri Lankan rupees and fled this morning.

While addressing the parliament, Herath requested to take immediate action to arrest people involved in the robbing of public assets without letting them leave the country, even by closing the airports.
A petition was tabled to take legal action against such people. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
